Data: {"recipient_id": "f15248d5-d0a0-48e3-bb1f-871d13723cc1", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": true, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Phone", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-phone.svg", "is_required": false, "entity_name": "_PHONE"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
what is the highest spender doing on newsbreak

The top advertisers on NewsBreak generally spend around $20k to $30k daily. This level of spending typically indicates a strong commitment to advertising and reaching a large audience. If you have more specific questions about advertising strategies or performance, feel free to ask!

Could you clarify what you mean by 'verticals'? Are you asking about the types of industries or categories that are most active in advertising on NewsBreak? Let me know so I can provide the best information for you!

Great! Here are some of the main verticals that are active on NewsBreak:
1. **Health and Wellness** - Includes products like collagen, pain relief braces, and hearing aids.
2. **Lead Generation** - Covers various services such as insurance and home services.
3. **Finance** - Focuses on asset management and retirement planning.
4. **E-commerce** - Everyday clothing and consumer products.
5. **Beauty** - Products like hair growth treatments and wrinkle serums.
If you need more details about any specific vertical, just let me know!

Weight loss products typically fall under the Health and Wellness vertical. This can include supplements, meal plans, fitness programs, and more. If you're looking for specific advertising strategies or examples related to weight loss on NewsBreak, just let me know!
what creative strategy should we use?

For a successful creative strategy on NewsBreak, consider using broad native-style images and horizontal videos, especially for gadgets. User-generated content (UGC) can also be effective for lead generation. Make sure your ads align with NewsBreak's policies to avoid rejections. If you need more specific tips or examples, feel free to ask!
what does the top advertiser spend a day on newsbreak?

The top advertisers on NewsBreak typically spend around $20k to $30k daily. This level of investment usually indicates a strong commitment to reaching a wide audience and maximizing their advertising impact. If you have more questions about advertising or strategies, just let me know!
how do i get ads approved? the ad review is very strict on me, i don't think they like me.

Getting ads approved can sometimes be tricky, but here are a few tips to help you out:
1. **Follow the Guidelines**: Make sure your ads comply with NewsBreak's advertising policies. Double-check for any prohibited content.
2. **Clear Messaging**: Ensure that your ad copy is clear and straightforward, avoiding any misleading claims.
3. **Quality Visuals**: Use high-quality images or videos that are relevant to your product or service.
4. **Test Variations**: If an ad gets rejected, try tweaking it slightly and resubmitting.
If you want more detailed guidelines, I can help you find the relevant policy document! Just let me know!
who approves the ads? can you share email?

Ads on NewsBreak are typically reviewed and approved by the ad review team. If you have specific questions or need to appeal a rejection, you can reach out to them at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They can provide more insights into the approval process and any issues with your ads. If you need further assistance, just let me know!
